commits.message:
Major CloudFormation commit...
-Made "lastUpdatedTime" optional in StackSummary
-Implemented all CloudFormationService method calls except updateStack() and estimateTemplateCost()
-Added rudimentary IAM controls.  (Only for CF actions)
-Implemented rollback logic and parsing "onFailure" and "disableRollback" fields in createStack()
-Removed most uses of the "Template" object, putting most of its fields into StackEntry
-Added code to check for CAPABILITY_IAM for IAM Resources
-Better error handling in CloudFormationService
-Removed all join tables on the "Stack" object, using LOB json fields for collections.
-Finalized db model, removed template table.
-Implemented glisten workflows for create, and remove stack.
-Handles additional fields in AWS::EC2::Instance
-Added AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup and AWS::EC2::SecurityGroupIngressRule resources.
-Dealt with the following Eucalyptus bugs/stories.
  EUCA-8492 (Security Group Resource)
  EUCA-8941 (Cloudformation CRUD model)
  EUCA-8943 (Security Group Ingress Resource)
  EUCA-8315 (Cloudformation workflow/workflow engine)
  EUCA-8490 (Describe operations)
  EUCA-8495 (IAM Support)
  EUCA-8489 (Additional fields support in Instance Resource)
  Also added support for list*, describe*, get/setStackPolicy (not enforced), and getTemplate() operations, and
  validateTemplate() operations.

What is still missing:
  Non-admin users being able to always do the right thing if no access to resources.
  Full IAM support.
  Update stack support (this is big)
  Most resources.
  Tag propegation from the stack
  Notificiation ARNs (we don't currently support SNS anyway)
  Deleting Stacks that are currently being created
  Database purge (should delete "is_record_deleted" rows over 90 days old)
